name: Nino Social Connect
author: ninotheme.com

sections.description:
Nino Social Connect is a super lightweight free social media WordPress plugin that allows you to quickly links Social Media Icons to Your Social Media Profiles.

For more information, check out ninotheme.com.

Features

  • Support 37 social network.
  • 40 social icons skins.
  • 8 cool effects.
  • 3 social size : 64×64 – 46×46 – 32×32.
  • Each social provider can be enabled or disabled.
  • Using image sprite that will reduce the number of server requests and save bandwidth.
  • Drag and drop icon to make order
  • Open social link in new tab
  • Shortcode
  • Custom code
  • Change social position (left – center – right)
  • Easy to Configure

Currently supported social networks

  • Aim
  • Bebo
  • Behance
  • Blogger
  • Carbonmade
  • Delicious
  • Deviantart
  • Digg
  • Dribbble
  • Email
  • Etsy
  • Evernote
  • Facebook
  • Flickr
  • Formspring
  • Forrst
  • Foursquare
  • Github
  • Google Plus
  • Instagram
  • Lastfm
  • Linkedin
  • Myspace
  • Orkut
  • Path
  • Pinterest
  • Quora
  • Reddit
  • Rss
  • Soundcloud
  • Stumbleupon
  • Technorati
  • Tumblr
  • Twitter
  • Vimeo
  • WordPress
  • Youtube
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Download the plugin from this page.
  2. Navigate to Plugins → Add New.
  3. Click Upload → click Choose file → upload the plugin zip and click Install Now button.
  4. Activate the plugin when installation is completed.

Configuration

After installing and activating the plugin → go to Settings → Nino Social Connect → add your social profile in social button section.

Tick the checkbox to enable / disable the social.

  • Fix bugs

1.1

  • More 20+ social icons skins

1.0

  • First public release
